sqlMap.procedure:
SELECT STATN_CODE /*역 코드*/, AREA_CODE /*지역 코드*/, ( SELECT CMMN_CODE_VALUE FROM CMMN_CODE WHERE CMMN_CODE = AREA_CODE ) AS AREA_NAME /*지역 명*/, STATN_NM /*역 명*/, NVL(REGISTER, '--') AS REGISTER /*등록자*/, NVL(UPD_USER, '--') AS UPDUSR /*수정자*/, NVL(TO_CHAR(RGSDE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), '--') AS RGSDE /*수정일*/, NVL(TO_CHAR(UPDDE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), '--') AS UPDDE /*수정일*/ FROM TABLE( PK_ADMIN_STATN.FN_SLT_STATN(#srcType,mode=IN#, #srcText,mode=IN#) ) ORDER BY STATN_CODE
/******************************************************************* * 이름 : FN_SLT_STATN * 설명 : 역 조회 함수 * 파라미터: 지역, 역 명 ******************************************************************/
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO STATN( STATN_CODE /*역 코드*/, AREA_CODE /*지역 코드*/, STATN_NM /*역 명*/, REGISTER /*등록자*/, RGSDE /*등록일*/ ) VALUES( ( SELECT 'STATN_CODE_'|| NVL( MAX( REGEXP_SUBSTR(STATN_CODE, '[^_]+', 1, 3)+1 ), 1 ) FROM STATN ), #areaCode#, #statnNm#, #register#, SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE STATN SET AREA_CODE = #areaCode# /*역 코드*/, STATN_NM = #statnNm# /*역 명*/, UPD_USER = #updUsr# /*수정자*/, UPDDE = SYSDATE /*수정일*/ WHERE STATN_CODE = #statnCode#
